Blog.post: it'S beeN a tiMe siNcE thE lasT tiMe i bloG b'cuZ oF tHe miD-yR exAm..yuPz..haiZ...tMl wiLL bE tHe lAst pApEr & alsO tHe laSt daY oF sCh..saDneSs..gOnnA miSS mY claSsmaTes..arGh!~..haTe tIs feeLing..sO faSt halF yR liaO le..nVamiNd we'll sTill haVe gaTheRinG durinG thE hoLiday...hOpE tAt we'LL proCeeD oN toGetHeR foR thE neXt 1 & a hAlf yrS...suRe wiLL..oK le..goNNa loG oFF..wisHing aLL thE besT to u all..stuDy harDz..1E rocKx...!~

iTs bLogGing tIme agaIn..haha...~yeSterDay waS jiN fAn mY bRo biRthdaY..Yar..hE iNvIteD uS tO maRina soUth foR steAmboAt..~yupZ..8 pplE gO..jiN faN,PoH hOng,alEx,gUo Hao,aLvIn,& twO jIn frEnz & mi..waH veRi sHagGed mostlY thE fOOd dErE i caNNot eaT siA...seAfooD & chiCkeN..cuZ i juZ recOveR frM chiCkeN poX..siANz..bUt nvAminD i wiLL cOmebAck tO haB mY 'revEnge' neXt tiMe...!~buT i Had mY fUll yeSterdAy..quiTe deLicIouS tHe fooD theRe..saW thEm eAt thOse stiNgraY & chICken wiNg reAlly pisSing Mi oFf...neVerthElesS wE hAd a fuN tiME deRe... aFteR tHe steaMbOat...wE travElleD tO esplanAte fOr drInkS & sIght-sEeiNg aS iT waS stiLL eaRly...wE boUghT sOme titbiTs & drInks thEre..guO haO & pOh hoNg diD soMe hip-hoP breaK daNce shOw uS..reAlly amaZing & cooL..felt liKe leaRninG it~...wE stAyeD thErE cHit-cHat tiLL arOunD 11 plus like tat theN wE gO ofF le.. ~wiSh jiN faN a HaPPy bElaTeD birThdaY~

oH yeaH...keeZ..iAm bLoggIng agAiN..siAnz mAn..rOttIng aT hOmE~nO choiCe buT tO bLog..haHa.~ toDaY's pRacTicAl teSt waS toTaLLy fiNishEd..oNce tHe teaCher dIstributE thE teSt paPer...i jUz sTareD bLanKly aT tHe PapEr..duN noE waT tO dO siA...coNNecTiOn cIrcUit aLsO fOrgOttEn..reaLLy -.-|||..haha..bUt luCkiLy..mY saVioUr caMe & taTs mY ED teAchEr mR liM..arHaz..hE heLpeD Us aloT..bY heLpiNg Us coNNecT tHe cIrcuIt..iF noT i rEallY caN't fiNd tHe aNsWer fOr tHE whoLe paPer...~!tHumBs Up 4 Mr LiM!~ blast my desire, break off the barrier nemutta yume wo tataki okoshite (kirisaku you na sukiru) blast my desire, stronger than fire jidai wo furuwasete risky tune (break what you wanna break) fRm.:: MoVe - BlAsT mY deSirE~~

WhOosH..mY neW blOggiE!~^.^caN poUr oUt mY haPPy aNd saD tiNks heRe..aWesoMe~HaHa..niCe tO usE bUt diN geT usEd tO iT..abiT haRd..hMm..maYbe iaM a neWbiE To iT..yaR..aLL rIte leTs geT stArteD tO scRibbLe a LonG waN ba~~~ tOdaY weDneSdaY..a ShorT daY iN scH..stuDy aRouNd 11:30am caN chaBo liaOz..aRhaZ..oUr wEekLy CS~bAttLEfiEld sEssIon staRts rIgHt aFtEr sCh..sTandaRd weD gO plaY~yuPz..bUt siaNz mY greAt buDDy jOsePh diN gO iF noT wE gOt moRe ppLe tO teaM uP~lEft onLi 7 oF uS gO..WilsOn,DaNiEl,XiaNg FeNg (mY jiE),PenG hOng,WeI sIanG,ZhaNg Xin & mi..soMe oF theM diN bRing sHirT sO haB tO gO tO mY greAt paL daNiel hSe leNd shIrt..sO wE BuN inTo 2 gRps aS zHanG xIn & wIlsOn waNteD tO asK teAcher sCh woRk & wEi sIanG gOt suMtiNk oN latEr theN meeT uS.. ~ a LoNG tRip fRm baLeStiEr tO bEdOk..(-.-!~shAggEd~)buT nevErtheLess iT waS quiTe fUn duRing tHe trIp oN thE buS..daNieL & JiE tOk tHe louDesT..aS iF tHey waNteD tO leT thE whOle bUs pasSeNgeRs tO noE waT thEy r tOkinG aBt..loLz..i notiCes todaY jIe abiT 'saLt saLt'wan keeP oN luFFinG 4 thE whOle daY ovEr a liTtle tiNk...bei tahaN..~hEr neW illneSs maYbe ba..lolZ.~ aRrIvinG aT daNieL hsE..aS wE waItinG 4 wiLsOn thEy aLL..daNiel chaLLengE mi 4 tHe ps2 smaCkdowN 5..hE waS daMn dAmN luCky 2 wIn mi thE lasT matCh..caN't beLievE iT siA..~aFteR thE gaMe, hE jumPeD in joY..wah kaoZ!!!~caN't staNd hIm sIa..iF noT JiE keeP oN tiCkLeD mY leG..i wiLL wiN thE matCH 4 sUre~ juMpeD 2 thE coNclUsioN le..aT thOmSon CC..tats thE neW plaCe wheRe wE laN-gamiNg todaE..quIte ExPenSive..$2.40 fOr 1 hR..wE plaYeD foR 2hRs SuMtiNk..sO totaL uP iS $6.20 lyK tiS..omG~quIte fuN aNd sOnG 4 fraGGing alOt oF ppLeS.hehe..pEnG hOng veRi piTy caNNot plaY aS hE forGotteN tO leNd shiRt sO haB 2 waIt 4 uS sO hE deciDe 2 plaY bb wiF thOse plaYerS tO kill tiMe..da jIe cS haS imProvE le..haha..heaDshot ppLe moSt oF thE tiMe..nOt bAd..~ Ok lE...tMl gOT tesT iN tHe mOrniNg sO haB tO stOp heRe le..muZ turN iN eaRly..niteZ~!~

~bLoGGinG tiMe...1 moRe weeK scH reopenS...great..caN seE mY freNz liaOz..miSs tHem aLL..tHe greAt tiMeS wiF theM..hahAz..huMph..toDay i aCcomPanY xiAng feNg JiE & cHerYll gO pS intervIew foR jOb aNd alSo ShoPPing..wAh..shOp tiLL verI tirEd..heLp & sEE thEm tEst thE perFumE aNd coSmetiC caN bE shAtteRing..nW thEn i reAlise y gaLs caN staY iN coSmetiC shOp foR sO loNg..waLk tiLL hAlF waY i mEt mY beSt brO..jiN faN..hahA..reaL shocK whEn wE walK pasT..hE toGeTheR wiF weNxiN..cOngraTs..finAlly beComE a couplE..gD waN broZ..cheErs 4 u..jiE waSn't righT todaY..maYbe oTheR reasOns maKing heR so saD..caN't saY muCh tO hEr..onli listEn tO hEr feeLing..haiZ!~gonnA cheEr uP jiE!~..k..goT tO stOp heRe le..feeLing slpY..niteZ!~

3rD daY oF sCh goNnA starTs iN a FeW moRe hRs...iTs laTe buT inSteAd oF sLpiNg, iaM heRe tO tyPe mY thOughTs...iTs greAt tO bE toGeTheR wiF mY sCh matEs..fUns & luFfeR waS thE moTiVatIon tO proCeeD oN wiF theM..aLthOuGh i Did wEll iN thE miD yR eXam..thEre waS nO reaSon tO slaCkz bUt tO woRk eVeN mORe haRd..yupZ..nTh chAngE iN sCh..stiLL thE saMe piEceS aS beForE..nEw faCes oF juLy inTaKe..nEw teaChers teaChinG uS..anD loNg & stuPid tiMe taBle..waH..siaNz...nO earLy diSmiSs...oK..gonNa tO sLp..niteZ~!~siGhx..heaRtsaNk foR no reaSon...~~~
